alerts.message:
...Frost advisory remains in effect from midnight tonight to 8 am
EDT Saturday...

* locations...greater capital district...Mid Hudson valley... 
 southern Taconics...and Litchfield Hills.

* Timing...late tonight into early Saturday morning.

* Temperatures...33 to 36.

* Impacts...areas of frost may result in damage to tender 
 vegetation that is not protected.

Precautionary/preparedness actions...

A frost advisory means that frost is possible. Sensitive outdoor
plants may be killed if left uncovered.
